title: Persidafon Dafonsoro
text:
Persidafon Dafonsoro or Persidafon Jayapura or Persidafon is an Indonesian <a href="association%20football">football</a> club based in <a href="Jayapura%20Regency">Jayapura</a>, <a href="Papua%20%28province%29">Papua</a>. The club was founded in 1970. The traditional team home kit is black and white striped shirt, resembles the <a href="Udinese%20Calcio">Udinese Calcio</a> shirt. The club plays in the <a href="Barnabas%20Youwe%20Stadium">Barnabas Youwe Stadium</a>, <a href="Sentani%20%28town%29">Sentani</a>, <a href="Jayapura%20Regency">Jayapura</a>. Their homebase is in Dafonsoro, <a href="Papua%20%28province%29">Papua</a>.
The club is named after the Dafonsoro mountain (also known as <a href="Cyclops%20Mountains">Cyclops Mountains</a>) near Jayapura.
